Reviews.Title: Cool features but bad photo quality
Reviews.Author: Anaïs V.
Reviews.Content: I recently bought this camera after testing it in several different stores. I was drawn to the many different options avaiable to choose from, including the one that automatically takes the photo as soon as the subject smiles. The colours on the large LCD screen were beautiful and extremely close to the items I took pictures of. So I bought the camera, thinking I would be very happy with it.That night, I took quite a few photos indoors and, the next day, took some shots outside. I also experimented with the macro and supermacro modes and finally uploaded all the pictures to the computer. I thought there was some sort of error in uploading when I saw how most of the pictures looked. I deleted them from the computer and reloaded them, hoping that that there had been some sort of error the first time. Unfortunately, that was not the case.The photos were very washed out once on the computer as well as when they were printed, though they had appeared beautifully on the screen. After checking around, I found that this seems to be a major plague of this camera. Also, though the macro mode produced some good photos (despite the colouration), the supermacro mode produced photos of very poor quality.I give this camera 3 stars mainly because of how easy it is to use and the many different settings available, as well as the decent speed of taking photos. However, the fact that the actual pictures are not of very decent quality knocks off a star and the other lost star is due to the fact that many of the available settings don't really add much to the camera overall. For instance, the mode that takes a photo instantly once the subject smiles does not operate that well. The subject must stay still for a few seconds and, if they move even slightly, the camera will have to reposition and reset itself before it takes the picture, wasting quite a bit of time in the process. However, since the actual picture quality is more important than the bells and whistles, I returned this camera shortly after purchasing it.

Reviews.Title: Great camera with lots of options
Reviews.Author: Honda Mom 99 "Carrie"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera.  My husband and I replaced an old Kodak and did a lot of research to find something decent for our money.  I really like the different features to choose from.  Other customers have mentioned their pictures were washed out.  I did not encounter that problem unless I chose the wrong setting to shoot the picture.  I found that indoor pictures taken on the automatic setting look yellowed (depending on the lighting), however if the shot is taken on the indoor setting the pictures come out fine.I also love the action shot setting.  I took some great photos of my husband and son jumping through a wave in the Atlantic Ocean.  You can see the individual water droplets around them!  I like that the pictures come out clear and are not pixilated, even when taken from a distance and zoomed in.The video option is nice if you don't want to lug around a lot of equipment.  I was amazed at how many video snipets we took while vacationing and we still had a lot of memory left over.  You can also choose to capture sound with each photo taken.  For someone who wants to remember names, dates, or specific places this can be a great feature.  We have captured our son saying some of the funniest things after the shot was taken!We purchased this camera to take on a cruise to document my parents' 50th wedding anniversary.  I would trust this product for any of your precious memories.A note of caution, if you do not pick up the memory card M+, you will find that the camera speed is slow.  I talked with a sales manager at Circuit City and he said it was the memory card that slows down the camera reset time, not the camera itself.  So if you want it to be ready to take another picture fast, spend the extra money and get the better card.

Reviews.Title: A great compact digital camera
Reviews.Author: J. Baskett "Firedog"
Reviews.Content: This a great compact digital camera. The pictures are clear and crisp. Images are not blurred and are vry good quality. Took it with me to the opening day of baseball season and I have had numerous folks comment on the quality of pictures this camera took and these comments were from folks that could care less about the game but were more amazed at the quality of the picture. There many different modes you can use to enhance your picture or correct red eye. I did a lot of research on the camera I wanted. Even bought another camera and took it back after having it for one day. I'm glad I went with the Olympus because it is our second Olympus after about 8 years andour prior Olympus is still a very good camera.I did find it less expensive at Office Depot($149.99) and bought it there.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 is very user-friendly
Reviews.Author: TexasShopper
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-340 has a good sized LCD, 5X zoom, and is very user-friendly specially for people who are simply point-and-shoot photographers.PROS:-- Camera has 5x zoom, looks solidly built, comes in great colors andthe control buttons are very intuitive.-- Has a Guide option which describes possible shooting scenarios(like shooting something behind a glass, shooting with brightbacklight) and you only need to select which scenario applies andthe camera provides you with the optimal settings. You just select it,then point and shoot.-- LCD screen is good sized and clear.-- Provides 4 different preview shots at once (splits LCD display in 4)and gives you the option to select which shot looks best to you.-- Image quality is good. Nothing spectacular, just good.CONS:-- Only takes xD picture cards.-- No burst mode (this is the continuous shooting mode).-- Write speed and flash recycle time is very slow.If you like fast burst mode, faster write speed, and SD card compatible,try either Canon SD1000 or Casio EX-Z80.

Reviews.Title: I love this new LCD monitor!
Reviews.Author: Alfred Voytek
Reviews.Content: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Silver)This is my third Olympus camera. I love them all. The previous camera, a Stylus 600, is a good camera. However,in sunlight, the LCD monitor was not easy to see. The FE-340's monitor is much improved. Also, this camera has many new features, like the 5X optical zoom that the other cameras do not have. This is the best camera I ever had.Alfred Voytek, Lake Worth, Florida.

Reviews.Title: An awesome camera!
Reviews.Author: Kristie A. Walker
Reviews.Content: The Olympus FE-340 is a great product. I have never taken better picture with any other camera before. I can shoot from inside the car and half the time the pictures look better than a shot taken while standing. It's amazing! I also love the feature that allows you to zoom in on the pictures that you've shot and that you can crop and brighten the photos right on the camera. It is light weight and compact, a great color, and it has a great zoom. This is a great camera for any photographer.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: B. Small "BHS"
Reviews.Content: This is my third Olympus camera.  I am very please with it, as with all the others.  I just wanted to upgrade to a smaller, but higher pixel camera.  So far I am very please with the pictures it takes.  It's certainly easy to use.  I travel a lot and this is perfect for putting in my purse and taking along.

Reviews.Title: So Much Bang For The Buck!
Reviews.Author: A. Ramos
Reviews.Content: After 26 years of being in the hobby of photography, I have already outgrown the stage where I thought that the best cameras were simply the ones with the most number of bells and whistles. There was a time when I wouldn't even consider something inexpensive, thinking that surely it's features weren't the latest. Maturity has given me the wisdom of realizing that as far as my point and shoots were concerned (and I've had so many of these through the years), I have never really availed of much of these whatchamacallit features! The point of having a point and shoot, after all, is to be able to just point and shoot (and leave all the adjustings with your SLRs)!  A few days ago, I ordered the affordable (inexpensive, not cheap) Olympus FE-340 and FE-290. Yes, I ordered both of them! I was attracted by the 5x optical zoom of the FE-340 and the 4x (with wide-angle) optical zoom of the FE-290, and I couldn't decide which one I wanted more. Well, it turns out that the combined price of both units were still less than the price of one comparable unit of another brand. More importantly, I simply trust the lens of the Olympus since I know that it is a long-time optical company that created an optical product, not just an electronics company that decided to dabble in cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: E. Blaylock
Reviews.Content: Fun and easy to use. This compact camera is great to take along for business or pleasure.  They say that a picture is worth a thousand words. Have used the camera to do home inspections and document items that need to be corrected.  Great pictures even in tight spots. Stores in your shirt pocket.

Reviews.Title: I did not like this camera.
Reviews.Author: Joyce Awramik
Reviews.Content: I am a fan of Olympus products, and have owned 5 previous Olympus digital cameras.  I was hoping this model would become my new primary photo machine.  The price was right, I was attracted by the nifty BLUE color: But dissappointment set in after I took it out of the box.  The two features that caused me to return the camera are:#1) the telephoto control is awkward, a pin head sized ball on the front of the camera.  I don't know why Olympus decided to get away from the eminently sensible toggle switch on the back which the right thumb could toggle while holding the camera steady with two hands.#2) was the killer though. Whenever the camera was turned off, when you turn it back on it resets itself to the AUTO setting.  It didn't hold my setting of FLASH OFF.  That resulted in an embarrassing moment in a very solemn situation where expressly there was NO FLASH ALLOWED.At that moment, I knew the camera was going back to the store.I want a camera that holds MY settings, not reverts to the default.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Angie D.
Reviews.Content: I don't understand the good reviews for this camera.  My problem is the one described by others:  photos look great on LCD, terrible once uploaded to the computer.  My son's fourth birthday party photos were a disaster: the colors were blown out, kids blurry and the zoom created weird, shiny eyes on the children.  The only photos that were even okay were close-ups when the children were posing and not moving at all.  We tried every setting and none worked to take decent action shots.  What a disappointment, as the features *seem* like they would make a very cool camera indeed.  But if you can't take a good picture, what's the point of cool features?

Reviews.Title: STAY AWAAAYYYY!!
Reviews.Author: samuel "talentscout"
Reviews.Content: I think that cameras are bought so that I can take beautiful pics. I took pics with this camera and then uploaded the pics onto my pc... all I can say is that the picture quality is very DISSAPOINTING. I had a 4mg pixel nikon that I gave away before buying this but looking at the pics I took with my 4mp camera, the nikon wins by far. I dont write reviews normally but for this camera, stay away.

Reviews.Title: Panorama with 2G Olympus XD memory doesn't work
Reviews.Author: DuckBoyQuinn "DuckBoyQuinn"
Reviews.Content: I'd give this a better rating, but I can't do Panorama Pictures with the new 2Gb Olympus brand XD card I bought with the camera.  I put a 1Gb Olympus XD in and the Panorama option works.  So, it looks like the camera has a firmware problem recognizing the newer 2Gb Olympus XD cards.Olympus will only allow Panorama pictures with "their" brand XD cards. So, I was extremely disappointed when I discovered this problem.So, I only gave this a 3-star rating since with 8Mp pictures you really do want to use as large of memory cards as possible... For all types of pictures.**** Found out the New Olympus Brand XD card was the problem with not being able to do panorama.  I used an eraser to clean the contacts.  Then it started working.so, now... if I could figure out how to up my rating... I'd up it to 4stars.I didn't like how the camera performed taking pictures in the school gym at my daughter's concert.  I never did quite get the correct settings for a decent (non blurry) picture.  If I had figured out how to turn off the auto-focus, it probably would have done better.Now that I've been using the camera a few weeks.  I've found that one feature I like is the "smile" mode for pictures.  My daughter has also been using the "self" portrait mode.  The macro picture feature works well too.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Anthony Perez "Anthony Perez"
Reviews.Content: This slick, light weight camera is the best I've ever had.  It's simple to use, yet comes with so many endless options to choose from for all occasion's.  You can choose your picture size and it also records.  The Olympus CD is easy to use, and pictures upload and print beautifully.  I highly recommend this camera for everybody!!

Reviews.Title: Very nice compact 'on the go camera'
Reviews.Author: Gerald M. Debaker
Reviews.Content: I am well pleased with the ease of taking pictures, and all the features of this Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom. It is hard to believe that it can do so much for it's size, and price. AMAZON.COM service was very good, quick, and also FREE SHIPPING.

Reviews.Title: Nice little camera, not great, but not bad
Reviews.Author: Jerry Jackson Jr.
Reviews.Content: The Olympus FE-340 provides a respectable 8 megapixels of resolution with acceptable levels of performance across the board. If you are looking for a well built, slim, entry-level camera that's easy to use, the FE-340 makes a good choice. However, the average image quality and smeared flash photos make this camera fall short of perfection. There are a lot of good things about the camera - easy-to-use interface, stylish build, great colors, and a good lens with a little more range than is the norm at this price point. Unfortunately, you'll have to accept the good with the bad, which means soft details, aggressive NR in high-ISO performance, and average battery life.Pros:  * Solid metal body with nice styling  * Plenty of resolution in LCD  * Nice lens  * Easy to useCons:  * Average image quality  * Average overall performance  * Smeared flash shots, and noise/noise reduction in general

Reviews.Title: Disappointing, to say the least
Reviews.Author: Moose
Reviews.Content: The FE-340 is the third Olympus camera that I have purchased. Not that I am loyal to the Olympus brand, but I am used to the controls so I figured I can't go wrong. That was a mistake. This is the worst of the cameras I have bought. I love the re-chargeable battery, but that is about the extent of what is good about this camera. Pictures consistently come out blurry, no matter what mode is used. I have taken many pictures at events I have attended, only to come home and find that they are blurry and thus useless. I would not recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera!
Reviews.Author: Kelly Moore "Speed Demon"
Reviews.Content: I absolutely love this camera!  I'm not a camera person and have very little experience taking photos (usually with disposable cameras).  However, this camera is super easy to use and after playing with it for an afternoon I had some really good shots.  When I finally take time to study the instuction book & learn how to use all the features I know I'll be a pro!  The display screen it just the right size (some are too small) and is very clear when viewing your shots.  One of the features on the camera is for taking pictures thru glass.  I lined my camera up between the slates of the blinds so they weren't visible and took numerous shots of my sister's dog sunning on the deck.  You absolutely cannot tell it's taken through glass.  I am actually buying the same camera in pink for my sister for her birthday because she had so much fun with mine.  I would definitely recommend getting the 2GB picture card for the camera to increase the memory.  For approximately $20, it's well worth it.  I would also recommend buying thru Amazon - I searched high & low for the cheapest price on this particular camera and nobody beat Amazon.  I know you'll love this camera if you give it a "shot"!!!

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom
Reviews.Author: W. Wilkin "Call me Ahab"
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent compact digital camera.  I have not yet explored it's full capabilities, but one feature that is truly significant is 5x optical zoom.  The digital zoom is integrated with the optical zoom so that it easy to tell how much of each you are using.The images in low light conditions are good.  It is an 8MP camera, so the images with decent lighting conditions are just sub-professional quality.Considering all the features that work well on the camera, the price is amazingly reasonable.I haven't yet explored the video features of the camera.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful photos at affordable price!
Reviews.Author: Jeffrey L. Horton
Reviews.Content: I bought one of these a couple of months ago and I must say I'm very pleased.  The photos I've taken with it (and I'm not a 'photographer') have come out wonderfully clear, especially outdoors.  The optical zoom at 5x is a nice touch, since digital zooms are never as clear, and 5x is pretty much close enough for anything but serious outdoor or wildlife shots.  Oh, and the battery life is great... I haven't had to charge it yet!"Bang for the buck" on this product is VERY good!

Reviews.Title: Great basic camera
Reviews.Author: Adam B. Obrecht "agbus98"
Reviews.Content: We purchased the camera to take on trips and just have availble.  I also have an SLR for other photo's.  But this camera has been suprisingly good at taking many different types of pictures with its scene settings and they are easy to use.  It is just the right size (not to small or large) and the screen is easy to use.  The quality of the photos has been great and they have printed up well.

Reviews.Title: Morbid paleness
Reviews.Author: gooseberry
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera prioritizing the size and picture quality first of all. Own Kodak Easyshare z7590. Just needed a decent small camera for my wife. For short, Olympus fe340 is well organized especially for an amateur such as my wife, nice large LCD. However, there is one painful flaw about this one - the pictures come out morbidly pale. Used different functions, tried viewing them on 2 modern laptops, printed them out - can't help it. On the camera LCD they look just fine, but nowhere else beyond it. Returning this item to Beach Camera who is charging me 10% restocking fee or whatever they call it - find a better seller.

Reviews.Title: Best camera ever !
Reviews.Author: sylvia m. varhus
Reviews.Content: the pics from this camera make everyone look good.  it is easy to use and is consistent from year to year.  i will never buy another brand of camera again.  olympus is it for me.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Kenn "Kenn Hitt"
Reviews.Content: This camera was a replacement for me,I lost the old.Had this camera for years and it provided great pictures and very reliable.Only down side is the Xd  memory cards are hard to find locally.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: loflady
Reviews.Content: The Olympus FE-340 camera is perfect for me.  Efficient, simple to use and takes great pictures and video clips. PERFECT.

Reviews.Title: FE 340
Reviews.Author: Christine DeLisle
Reviews.Content: As usual the Olympus 340 proves to be an excellent travel camera. Small and compact - takes good crystal clear photos. Captures up close subjects amazingly. So very glad to have it again, carry it with me everywhere as one never knows what you'll see

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Beka
Reviews.Content: I have had this camera for a couple years now and I love it. The only issue I had was that the memory card does not fit my laptop and I seemed to have misplaced the cord. I did however get a replacement usb cord through amazon. I wish they would make memory cards universal for all computer slots. It's all good though I have this camera in pinka dn i love it!! I have had iit for maybe 3-4 years and it is great.

Reviews.Title: Good, but not good enough.
Reviews.Author: Jason McRales
Reviews.Content: The Olympus FE-340 is a higher end beginner's digital camera.So I expect good image quality. You'll appreciate the image quality outisde, but not inside. My camera took forever to focus inside and it was off. Even though image quality is a large part of the camera, it's not everything. Shot to shot times are horrible, and shutter lag sucks. Switching scene modes is hard with the dial, and it takes at least 3 seconds for the camera to switch into any shooting mode. The camera has good high-iso performance, at least better than average, but there is a lot of smudgy noise reduction.To make things worse, the camera only uses xD cards, which are expensive, and even the faster models are not as fast as cheap sd cards. This results in slow transfer and write times.Overall, this is a good camera if you are not picky and just want a nice camera for outdoor shots. If you are though, it's not for you.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jlueker "Jlueker"
Reviews.Content: Overall the Olympus FE-340 is a great point and shoot camera.I have had it for about 2 years now and I just love it..Pros:: Very Easy to use  Takes good pics (What do you expect from a point and shoot? SLR quality??  Nice screen and size  compacted and light for portability  Features are great for a camera that came out in 2008Cons:: Honestly I don't have anyThanks

Reviews.Title: Decent camera
Reviews.Author: BeGreen
Reviews.Content: This is a decent camera because it takes many great photos, but there are still come issues.For the most part, my pictures come out looking great.... except when I need to take indoor no-flash photos. I would take the photos with flash, sometimes the photo does not look good. So, I would try without flash and then I'm stuck with a very blurry photo! So, every non flash photo I take, almost all of them end up with blurriness.The indoor lighting isn't bad in most occasions and I think I have a steady hand, so I don't know why this camera always gives me blurry photos.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: LibKat "book goddess"
Reviews.Content: Good camera.  It probably is better than I know since I do not use all the settings.

Reviews.Title: It was a good buy
Reviews.Author: Anna
Reviews.Content: The camera its light to carry, good definition, quality pictures. The only issue was that still on guarantee the lens had to be changed, on Olympus dind't knew what made the lens to fail. It was a good buy though.

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!
Reviews.Author: E. GONZALEZ
Reviews.Content: I OWN THIS CAMERA... AND I LOVE IT! EVERYONE IS ALWAYS TELLING ME HOW NICE AND CLEAR MY PICTURES COME OUT! IT'S A GREAT CAMERA!!! BUY ONE!

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: R. Kauffman
Reviews.Content: This camera takes vivid pic's and is so easy to operate. It's a best buy!!!

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Timika L. Thomas "proud mom"
Reviews.Content: This is the second time I've bought this camera and I absolutely love it. It is priced right and I'd even say your getting a great deal. It takes clear pictures and up to 8MP which is awesome. The features are great, and I'd definitely recommend this camera to everyone.

Reviews.Title: Excellent value
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Deking
Reviews.Content: I found the Olympus FE-340 to be very easy to use and take high quality photos with. If there are any limitations for casual everyday camera users, I am not aware of them. I recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great "little" Camera
Reviews.Author: IVOR
Reviews.Content: Bought this great "little" camera for my wife (so she could stop using mine), she is a teacher and is constantly taking pictures of her students and their activities! She loves it!!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Mary A. Musilek
Reviews.Content: I was very happy with my purchase.  My daughter wanted the  blue camera and all we could find were pink ones.  She loves the camera.  The price was reasonable and we got it very quickly.  Thank You

Reviews.Title: Great Camera
Reviews.Author: Sophia Heick "Sophia Heick"
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It is very small and has awesome zoom, everything works wonderfully and I would recommend it to any photographer. The options are also great to play with.

Reviews.Title: really good camera
Reviews.Author: Latea Alexandru "alfab"
Reviews.Content: The camera is better than i expected. Lot of options, good colors and good picture quality, especially in day light.It also take good pictures in the dark, but you have to be close to the subject. For a compact camera , it takes excellent pictures .

Reviews.Title: Good Camera for the amature photographer
Reviews.Author: Aggiebeck
Reviews.Content: Overall I am happy with this camera.  Some picture have come out blurry but the colors are good, zoom is amazing, and it's small enough to fit in a coin purse. I would recommend it, Olympus builds a good camera.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE 340
Reviews.Author: Robert Otrega "R.Ortega"
Reviews.Content: We have always liked Olympus Cameras we tried a different brand and was just disappointed. We love the body style of the FE340 and how easy it is to use. The quality of the pictures are great this camera will not disappoint any one that would buy and use it and the price was great...The 8MP is more than enough. The Zoom features are fantastic.. Enjoy if you buy it..

Reviews.Title: Great quality camera
Reviews.Author: S. St James
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. It takes great pictures even when the subject is moving. I am glad I chose it.  It is the right size to fit in my purse and easy to learn to use. The Olympus makes a good digital camera. The only thing is does not come with the xd picture card like some other digitals.  But was at a great price, new and again a great digital camera if you are looking for a point and shoot.

Reviews.Title: Olympus FE340
Reviews.Author: Robert L. Unkrich
Reviews.Content: Easy-to-use camera.  Would be better with a view window.  Difficult at times seeing the image in the LCD viewer.  Quality of pictures very good but not the best.

Reviews.Title: Very nice camera
Reviews.Author: Angelica Garcia Feria
Reviews.Content: Well, You have to know the resolution of the picture, and the zoom, those are very important things, so you buy your camera. I'm very happy for my camera, I have share with some of my friends, and they really like it. Everybody say, wow, wow, nice camera. easy to take picture, and video. really good.

Reviews.Title: Good quality for such a price.
Reviews.Author: Ignacio Pita Jimeno
Reviews.Content: This digital camera provides a good quality at a good price. Is a good choice if you are looking for non profesional camera.

Reviews.Title: Great digital camera w/wide view
Reviews.Author: Marylisa Jackson
Reviews.Content: The quality of the pictures from this camera are unbeatable. I would highly recommend this product to others.

Reviews.Title: All is as promised
Reviews.Author: Lisa Chesnutt
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my step daughter for christmas. I was pleased with the shipping time.  I cannot really rate the product because she has not said anything about the camera.

Reviews.Title: A shade worse than FE-230
Reviews.Author: alexelle "alexelle"
Reviews.Content: I own an Olympus FE-230 which I recently gave away to my folks for taking pics of my baby niece.The FE-230 is light, sleek and extremely nice with the picture quality.I got hooked onto Olympus with this camera and decided to try the FE-340 which,as the model number suggests is a more evolved variety--or so I thought!It is far bulkier and heavier which is a HUGE negative for me.Most importantly, in no-flash mode, the camera does not adjust for low light and in fact the pictures come much darker than the actual light of the surroundings!I am not sure if there is sophisticated workaround (which beats the purpose of a point and shoot,of course) to this low light outcome.I wont say I am thrilled with this heavier and wider cousin of the FE-230.I'll suggest checking other varieties like the Nikon coolpix before deciding on this one.

Reviews.Title: wonderful
Reviews.Author: Leah Christensen
Reviews.Content: this product is easy to use and the software was easy to install and use though i have not printed any pictures it looks like they will be easy to print. reviewing the picures is great! i have told friends that are looking to purchace a new camera that this is the camera to get.

Reviews.Title: Love it
Reviews.Author: Michael H. Farris "Seattle Rugger"
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived quickly and it's very easy to operate as well as a good size.  For the price you can't go wrong.

Reviews.Title: Not What I Thought would be.
Reviews.Author: Digital Photographer "Used to Like Nikon,s"
Reviews.Content: I have owned several Olympus Products, most worked well, color was usually excellent, FE-340 breaks the mold.Someone else mentioned that photos come out pale, I agree, the general color quality is not too good, actually it is poor, not at all what Olympus usually does.This performance in the download to card is very slow, I am using a Fuji M512 card, works very well on Fuji or other Olympus cameras.I going to return this camera, it just is not acceptable.

Reviews.Title: muy buen producto
Reviews.Author: Rafael Narvaez "Rafael Narvaez"
Reviews.Content: muy buen producto, gran calidad de imagen.. es mi segunda camara olympus y para el precio me parece una muy buena opcion..Trae bateria recargable de litio, gran pantalla lcd, facil manejo del menu, en fin muy buena camara..

Reviews.Title: wrong gear in box
Reviews.Author: Donald Scott
Reviews.Content: Some how i received a box that had a nonstandard charger.  I imagine the camera is nice, but I had to return it.

Reviews.Title: Olympus is a terrible company!!!
Reviews.Author: KH "lukesmom"
Reviews.Content: I had this item for two weeks and was kneeling on the floor taking a picture and the camera slipped out of my hands. It fell maybe a foot (remember, I was kneeling). When i picked it back up it would not turn on. We sent it bck to Olympus because we were well within warranty, and they sent us a letter back saying that since it was an "impact" issue, our warranty was null and void, but that they would be happy to repair it for us for $90. The camera cost us $175 new! They wanted to charge us over half of the cost of a new camera to fix it when they should have honored their warranty anyway! We will never buy an Olympus again and I recommend that you do not waste your money!

Reviews.Title: Junk, stay away from this product
Reviews.Author: M. Fields
Reviews.Content: I purchased this product in July 2008 and have been trying to make it work ever since.  I've got hundreds of vacation photos saved on the flash drive that I may never get to see.  The camera refuses to communicate with any computer.  Olympus tech support is only open during business hours when most of the world is at work which makes it useless to me.  I've owned several Cannons in the past with no troubles.  For some unknown reason I decided to give Olympus a try.  Never again.  I'll probably just throw it away having learned an expensive lesson:NEVER BUY ANYTHING WITH OLYMPUS WRITTEN ON IT.ps-  I gave this product one star which it does not deserve however Amazon says you have to give it at least one star to submit a rating.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing Purchase
Reviews.Author: Alan Dust
Reviews.Content: First, I'm disappointed in the camera and that's no fault of the seller.  However, shortly after purchasing the camera I found out that I could have bought the same camera model for 25% less elsewhere.  I also responded to a questionaire that the seller, Expo Eletronics, sent me to see if I was happy with my purchase.  I told them the same thing that I said here and still have not received any response from them.

ProductInfo.Features:
8.0-megapixel CCD captures enough detail for photo-quality 16 x 22-inch prints
5x image-stabilized optical zoom; Face Detection
Perfect Shot Preview mode
TruePic III image processor
Stores images on xD Picture Cards (not included)
ProductInfo.Name: Olympus FE-340 8MP Digital Camera with 5x Optical Zoom (Black)
